moves.name: Soaring Fist
moves.title: KRUSHING BLOW: Triggers if this ATTACK KOUNTERS or PUNISHES a HIGH ATTACK.

moves.name: Rising Chest Kick
moves.title: KRUSHING BLOW: Triggers if this ATTACK KOUNTERS or PUNISHES a GETUP ROLL.

moves.name: Back Throw
moves.title: KRUSHING BLOW: Triggers if opponent failed THROW ESCAPE during the previous THROW.

moves.name: Reserved Pain
moves.title: KRUSHING BLOW: Triggers if the OVERHEAD chop hits by itself.

moves.name: Tipping The Scales
moves.title: KRUSHING BLOW: Triggers if this KOMBO hits as a KOUNTER or PUNISH.

moves.name: Stage Fatality (Close)
moves.title: Can only be performed on certain stages.

moves.name: Rainbow Konnection (Mid)
moves.title:
KOMPETITIVE REQUIREMENTS:
• No Blocking during the final round of a Kompetitive Match.
• Friendships can be performed anytime outside of Kompetitive Matches.

moves.name: The Klassic
moves.title:
• DO NOT block an attack during the final round.
• Must hold [T].
• Final hit must come from an Uppercut [D]+[T].

moves.name: Essence Thief
moves.title:
• Press [S] and [T] during hit.
• Final hit must come from Toward Throw.
